definition: a medium brown to dark-brown color
details:
noun
- a medium brown to dark-brown color
= synonyms: umber
- a seed of the coffee tree
= example: a seed of the coffee tree
= synonyms: coffee bean, coffee berry
- a beverage consisting of an infusion of ground coffee beans
= example: a beverage consisting of an infusion of ground coffee beans
= synonyms: java
- any of several small trees and shrubs native to the tropical Old World yielding coffee beans
= synonyms: coffee tree
